description.raw:
I had submitted a broken pull request #356, and it got merged prematurely, so I reverted part of it in e700c94 and have fixed it again in this branch. The problem was using the `${SCRIPTS}` variable after changing folders, since that variable holds a relative path. I used a path relative to the `${WORKSPACE}` and that fixed my problem.

test builds:

* passed: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_math-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/85/
* pending: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-homebrew-amd64/57/
